archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Collect Party Profile
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Create a profile for a party and/or a party role and collect profile attribute values. For example, a list of hobbies in which a party is involved.

properties.value: Collect Party Profile creates a profile for a party and/or a party role and collects profile attribute values. For example, a list of hobbies in which a party is involved. The attribute is placed in a group if it is defined as part of one. Demographics about the party may become part of the profile if a relationship between the two has been specified. It can be collected directly from a party or from another source, such as social media or professional groups to which a party belongs,. This process also enables changes to be made to any of these aspects for a profile or a profile's attribute(s).
